# The `ShadowMapping` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This struct defines the shadow mapping using the rule: If <code>kFixed</code>, then shadow = (mem &gt;&gt; Scale) + Offset. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This struct defines the shadow mapping using the rule: If <code>kFixed</code>, then shadow = (mem &gt;&gt; Scale) + Offset.

If <code>kGlobal</code>, then extern char&#42; &#95;&#95;hwasan&#95;shadow&#95;memory&#95;dynamic&#95;address; shadow = (mem &gt;&gt; Scale) + &#95;&#95;hwasan&#95;shadow&#95;memory&#95;dynamic&#95;address If <code>kIfunc</code>, then extern char &#95;&#95;hwasan&#95;shadow&#91;&#93;; shadow = (mem &gt;&gt; Scale) + &amp;&#95;&#95;hwasan&#95;shadow If <code>kTls</code>, then extern char &#42;&#95;&#95;hwasan&#95;tls; shadow = (mem&gt;&gt;Scale) + align&#95;up(&#95;&#95;hwasan&#95;shadow, kShadowBaseAlignment)

If WithFrameRecord is true, then &#95;&#95;hwasan&#95;tls will be used to access the ring buffer for storing stack allocations on targets that support it.

Definition at line 408 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/hwaddresssanitizer-cpp">HWAddressSanitizer.cpp</a>.
